archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1104
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to be able to know if I am pre-approved for another device (based on credit rules), so that I know I can upgrade to that device

properties.value: PIM: OOTB save the credit score in dedicated field 4 customer credit check or displaying credit scoring is a part of ordering process credit score saved in PIM can also be shown to the customer in SC

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
